headline: A Little Good News for Ford Investors
summary: Good news for Ford investors: Recent sales data support Ford's major decision to pivot away from full electric vehicles.

headline: Is It Time To Reconsider Ford Motor (F) After Its 58% One Year Share Price Jump
summary: If you are wondering whether Ford Motor shares still offer value at around US$14.20, you are not alone. Many investors are asking the same question after a strong run in the stock. Ford's share price sits at US$14.20 after returns of 6.4% over the last week, 5.9% over the last month, 6.4% year to date, 58.1% over the past year and 90.4% over five years. This has naturally sharpened attention on what you might be paying for each future dollar of cash flow. Recent headlines around Ford have...
